summary: Website/app with a single main user who logs in via Internet Identity to edit all site content (text, images, homepage, about page, and general product/content sections), while all other visitors can view publicly without login.
architectural_notes: Authentication: use Internet Identity for the single main/admin user; no email/password login
Authorization: public read-only access for visitors without login; admin-only editing

new_feature_requests.summary: Add single main-user admin login via Internet Identity with full edit access; all other visitors have public read-only access without login
Provide editable website content sections (text, images, homepage, about page, and general 'products' sections as content-only, not e-commerce)
